channel.title: I need Delta help, and quick pl0x
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'm in need of some help. For some reason, you'll get hit when you login to my delta-based server. I've seen this before and heard that it has something to do with the jad. Altough I can't see the jad attack (big stony thing falling on top of me), I'm still getting hit.
It doesnt affect me that much, but it does to the other players on the server.
Help please?? How do I fix this??

item.title: I need Delta help, and quick pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Yes it is something to do with jad npc agression i think i ve fixed this on my source its to do with npchandler.java

Read full topic
item.source: I need Delta help, and quick pl0x
